/* CommonCd.listAllCommonCd */
SELECT groupCd, groupNm, itemCd, itemNm, itemMemo, itemSeq, flagYN FROM tblCommonCd ORDER BY itemSeq ASC
/* CommonCd.showCommonCd */ SELECT groupCd, groupNm, itemCd, itemNm, itemMemo, itemSeq FROM tblCommonCd WHERE groupCd = #{groupCd} AND itemCd = #{itemCd}
/* CommonCd.mappingGroupCd */ SELECT groupCd, groupNm FROM tblCommonCd WHERE itemCd IS NOT NULL GROUP BY groupCd, groupNm
/* CommonCd.listComCodeAll */ SELECT groupCd, groupNm, itemCd cd, itemNm nm, #{target} target FROM tblCommonCd WHERE flagYN = 'Y' and groupCd = #{groupCd} ORDER BY itemSeq
/* CommonCd.listComCodeGroupAll */ SELECT groupCd cd, groupNm nm, #{target} target FROM tblCommonCd WHERE flagYN = 'Y' GROUP BY groupCd, groupNm
